title: I like rewards
body:
Getting capsules at levels.

Getting chests off of a good game on a champ.

Getting chests/keys/capsules from honor.

I like it all. Then you open a chest and get some toxic emote.....gg...

I would rather get some crappy skin I would rarely use.

I realize different people have different likes and dislikes. Most people like getting skins, but what are the rewards you hate seeing when you open a box?

Did I miss any?

replies.body:
Champ shards are definitely disappointing to me. I own a little over half the champions, and I only buy the ones I enjoy so to get tons of champ shards and little skins/etc to actually use to upgrade the other skins makes me a bit annoyed.

Otherwise no complaints from me. Orange essence just can be a pain to get for ultimate skins at this time.
